name: LAUNCHub
tag_list: business, startup, incubator, entrepeneurs, funding, launchub, accelerator
overview:
LAUNCHub (Launch hub) is a 9M Euro Seed & Acceleration fund, supported by a mentor-led program that invests in startup companies, mainly from the ICT sector from Bulgaria and the region. Investments range from EUR 30K to 200K per company and guiding mentorship is also provided.

The fund is focused on investing in the “digital domain”: consumer internet, e-commerce, digital media, mobile. We love cloud, SAAS, and social. The fund aims at helping young and upcoming entrepreneurs to disrupt industries, such as banking, entertainment, education and others. LAUNCHub looks for teams and ideas that are capable to grow and be the next big thing!

On a strategic level, LAUNCHub is partnering with the largest early-stage micro seed investment fund and mentoring program in Europe – Seedcamp and with the Cisco Entrepreneur Institute Bulgaria.

It has also attracted as partners WebFWD - Mozilla’s Open Innovation program and DreamIt Ventures, a US venture capital firm specializing in incubation and seed investments.
